metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10705 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in Undertow in versions before Undertow 2.1.1.Final where certain requests to the "Expect: 100-continue" header may cause an out of memory error. This flaw may potentially lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
